history.subject: 2018春季-第八讲课堂实践练习
history.content:
有一台假想的计算机，页大小（page size）为32 Bytes，支持8KB的虚拟地址空间（virtual address space）,有4KB的物理内存空间（physical memory），采用二级页表，一个页目录项（page directory entry ，PDE）大小为1 Byte,一个页表项（page-table entries PTEs）大小为1 Byte，1个页目录表大小为32 Bytes，1个页表大小为32 Bytes。页目录基址寄存器（page directory base register，PDBR）保存了页目录表的物理地址（按页对齐）。

请手工计算后回答下列虚地址是否有合法对应的物理内存，请给出对应的pde index, pde contents, pte index, pte contents，the value of addr in phy page OR disk sector。

请写出一个translation程序（可基于python、ruby、C、C++、LISP、JavaScript等），输入是一个虚拟地址，依据物理内存模拟数据文件自动计算出对应的pde index, pde contents, pte index, pte contents，the value of addr in phy page OR disk sector。

题目：

https://github.com/chyyuu/os_course_exercises/blob/2018spring/all/04-1-spoc-discussion.md#%E8%99%9A%E6%8B%9F%E9%A1%B5%E5%BC%8F%E5%AD%98%E5%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E5%9C%B0%E5%9D%80%E8%BD%AC%E6%8D%A2

然后比较你的回答与往届同学的参考回复有什么不同，并说明原因。

下面是往届同学的参考回答：
https://piazza.com/class/i5j09fnsl7k5x0?cid=1012

https://piazza.com/class/i5j09fnsl7k5x0?cid=696

https://piazza.com/class/i5j09fnsl7k5x0?cid=700

history.content:
有一台假想的计算机，页大小（page size）为32 Bytes，支持8KB的虚拟地址空间（virtual address space）,有4KB的物理内存空间（physical memory），采用二级页表，一个页目录项（page directory entry ，PDE）大小为1 Byte,一个页表项（page-table entries PTEs）大小为1 Byte，1个页目录表大小为32 Bytes，1个页表大小为32 Bytes。页目录基址寄存器（page directory base register，PDBR）保存了页目录表的物理地址（按页对齐）。

请手工计算后回答下列虚地址是否有合法对应的物理内存，请给出对应的pde index, pde contents, pte index, pte contents，the value of addr in phy page OR disk sector。

请写出一个translation程序（可基于python、ruby、C、C++、LISP、JavaScript等），输入是一个虚拟地址，依据物理内存模拟数据文件自动计算出对应的pde index, pde contents, pte index, pte contents，the value of addr in phy page OR disk sector。

题目：

https://github.com/chyyuu/os_course_exercises/blob/2018spring/all/04-1-spoc-discussion.md#%E8%99%9A%E6%8B%9F%E9%A1%B5%E5%BC%8F%E5%AD%98%E5%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E5%9C%B0%E5%9D%80%E8%BD%AC%E6%8D%A2

然后比较你的回答与往届同学的参考回复有什么不同，并说明原因。

children.subject:
Virtual Address 6653:
  --> pde index: 19  pde contents: (7f, valid 0, pfn 7f)
    Page table does not exist.

Virtual Address 1c13:
  --> pde index: 07  pde contents: (bd, valid 1, pfn 3d)
    --> pte index: 00  pte contents: (f6 valid 1, pfn 76)
      --> To Physical Address ed3 --> Value: 12

Virtual Address 6890:
  --> pde index: 1a  pde contents: (7f, valid 0, pfn 7f)
    Page table does not exist.

Virtual Address 0af6:
  --> pde index: 02  pde contents: (a1, valid 1, pfn 21)
    --> pte index: 17  pte contents: (7f valid 0, pfn 7f)
      Invalid page table entry.

Virtual Address 1e6f:
  --> pde index: 07  pde contents: (bd, valid 1, pfn 3d)
    --> pte index: 13  pte contents: (16 valid 0, pfn 16)
      --> To Disk Sector Address 2cf --> Value: 1c

实现在附件中。translate.cpp

//C语言实现的虚拟存储结构模拟器

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <assert.h>

#define INDEX(x,y) (x << 5)+y
#define PDBR 0xd80
#define PAGE_NUM(x) x >> 5
#define PAGE_OFFSET(x) x & 0x1f
#define PDE_INDEX(x) x >> 10
#define PTE_INDEX(x) (x >> 5) & 0x1f
#define VALID(x) (x >> 7) & 0x1
#define NUM(x) x & 0x7f
#define ADDR(x,y) (x << 5)+y

int array[3] = {1,2,3};
int hxnum(char temp){
	switch(temp){
		case 'a': return 10;
		case 'b': return 11;
		case 'c': return 12;
		case 'd': return 13;
		case 'e': return 14;
		case 'f': return 15;
		default: return temp - '0';
	
	}
}
int str2x(char * str,int len){
	assert(len > 0);
	int sum = 0;
	
	for (int i = 0; i < len; i++){
		sum += pow(16,(len - i - 1)) * hxnum(str[i]);
	}

	return sum;
}
int get2(char* buffer, FILE* stream){
    char s;
    for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++){
        if ((s = fgetc(stream)) == -1) return -1;
        buffer[i] = s;
    }
    return 0;
}
int memory[128*32];
int disk[128*32];
void load(char* file_name, int * target){
    FILE* stream;
    char temp[2];
    int row = 0;
    int column = -1;
    if((stream = fopen(file_name,"r")) != NULL){
        while(get2(temp,stream) != -1){
            column++;
            if (column == 32){
                column = 0;
                row++;
            }
            int ans = str2x(temp,2);
            target[INDEX(row,column)] = ans;
        }
    }
   
}


int main(int argc, char** argv){
    load("M.txt",memory);
    load("D.txt",disk);
    
    int num = str2x(argv[1]+2,strlen(argv[1]) - 2);
    int pde_index = PDE_INDEX(num);
    int pte_index = PTE_INDEX(num);
    int offset = PAGE_OFFSET(num);
    
    //Look up page dictionary
    int pde_base = PDBR;
    int pde_address = PDBR + pde_index;
    int pde_row = PAGE_NUM(pde_address);
    int pde_column = PAGE_OFFSET(pde_address);
    int pde_content = memory[INDEX(pde_row,pde_column)];
    
    //Look up page table
    int pte_valid = VALID(pde_content);
    int pte_num = NUM(pde_content);
    int pte_row = pte_num;
    int pte_column = pte_index;
    int pte_content = pte_valid ? memory[INDEX(pte_row,pte_column)] : disk[INDEX(pte_row,pte_column)];
    
    //Get page
    int valid = VALID(pte_content);
    int number = NUM(pte_content);
    int row = number;
    int column = offset;
    int address = ADDR(number,offset);
    int answer = -1;
    if (number != 0x7f) {
        answer = valid ? memory[INDEX(row,column)] : disk[INDEX(row,column)];
    }
    
    printf("Virtual Address %#x:\n",num);
    printf("  --> pde index:%#x pde pos:(page %#x, offset %#x) pde contents:(%#x valid %d, pfn %#x)\n", pde_index,pde_row, pde_column, pde_content,pte_valid,pte_num);
    printf("    --> pte index:%#x pte pos:(page %#x, offset %#x) pte contents:(%#x valid %d, pfn %#x)\n", pte_index, pte_row, pte_column,pte_content, valid, number);
    printf("      --> To Physical Address %#x --> ",address);
    answer == -1 ? printf("Does Not Exist A Page\n") : printf("Value: %#x\n",answer);

    return 0;
}

使用C语言实现主要功能，使用如下python代码做数据预处理

import sys
if __name__ == "__main__":
    file_object = open(str(sys.argv[1]),'r')
    lines = file_object.readlines()
    file_object.close()
    strings = []
    for line in lines:
        array = line.split(' ')[2:-1]
        string = ""
        print(line)
        print(" ----> ")
        print(line.split(' '))
        for i in array:
            string = string + i
        strings.append(string)
    
    file_object = open(str(sys.argv[2]),'w+')
    for string in strings:
        file_object.write(string)
    file_object.close()

最终输出结果如下（虚拟存储0x330和0x1e6f处的结果）：

网址 https://github.com/chyyuu/os_course_exercises/blob/2018spring/all/04-1-spoc-memdiskdata.md 最下方的样例有错

Virtual Address 106f:
  --> pde index:0x3  pde contents:(valid 1, pfn 0x2d)
    --> pte index:0x14  pte contents:(valid 0, pfn 0x06)
      --> To Disk Sector Address 0x127 --> Value: 2c

0x106f对应的pde index和pte index显然不会是0x3,0x14

于墨翰

代码见https://github.com/oscourse-tsinghua/os2018-yumohan/blob/master/virtual%20address/page.py

和往届同学的参考结果一致

Virtual Address 6653:
--> pde index:0x19  pde content:(0x7f  0b1111111, valid 0, pfn 0x7f(page 0x7f))
Fault (page directory table entry not valid)
Virtual Address 1c13:
--> pde index:0x7  pde content:(0xbd  0b10111101, valid 1, pfn 0x3d(page 0x3d))
  --> pte index:0x0(0b0)  pte contents:(0xf6 valid 1, pfn 0x0
  --> To Physical Address 0x89(0b10001001) --> Value: 12
Virtual Address 6890:
--> pde index:0x1a  pde content:(0x7f  0b1111111, valid 0, pfn 0x7f(page 0x7f))
Fault (page directory table entry not valid)
Virtual Address 0af6:
--> pde index:0x2  pde content:(0xa1  0b10100001, valid 1, pfn 0x21(page 0x21))
  --> pte index:0x17(0b10111)  pte contents:(0x7f valid 0, pfn 0x0
Fault (page table entry not valid)
Virtual Address 1e6f:
--> pde index:0x7  pde content:(0xbd  0b10111101, valid 1, pfn 0x3d(page 0x3d))
  --> pte index:0x13(0b10011)  pte contents:(0x16 valid 0, pfn 0x0
  --> To Physical Address 0x25(0b100101) --> Value: 1c

https://gist.github.com/otowa-kotori/cd63d478fe883f3cfdf36add0655c3ec

example answers:

	--> pde index:0x19  pde content:(0x7f(01111111), valid 0, pfn 0x7f)
Fault (page directory table entry not valid)

Virtual Address 0x1c13(0001110000010011):
	--> pde index:0x07  pde content:(0xbd(10111101), valid 1, pfn 0x3d)
		--> pte index:0x00  pte content:(0xf6(11110110), valid 1, pfn 0x76)
			--> To Physical Address 0xed3(111011010011) --> Value: 0x12

Virtual Address 0x6890(0110100010010000):
	--> pde index:0x1a  pde content:(0x7f(01111111), valid 0, pfn 0x7f)
Fault (page directory table entry not valid)

Virtual Address 0x0af6(0000101011110110):
	--> pde index:0x02  pde content:(0xa1(10100001), valid 1, pfn 0x21)
		--> pte index:0x17  pte content:(0x7f(01111111), valid 0, pfn 0x7f)
Fault (page table entry not valid)

Virtual Address 0x1e6f(0001111001101111):
	--> pde index:0x07  pde content:(0xbd(10111101), valid 1, pfn 0x3d)
		--> pte index:0x13  pte content:(0x16(00010110), valid 0, pfn 0x16)
			--> To Disk Sector Address 0x2cf(001011001111) --> Value: 0x1c
